text: A bag contains a white and b black balls. Two players 4 and B alternatively draw a ball from the bag, replacing the ball each time after the draw till one of them draws a white ball and wins the game. If 4 begins the game and the probability of 4 winning the game is three times that of B then what is the value of a:b? @31 b)1:3 Â©2:1 @t1:2
